purpose: To provide a scalable environment for testing and benchmarking AI agents on Windows operating systems
principle: Utilizes Windows-specific capabilities to simulate real-world environments for multi-modal AI agents
reusability: Offers a modular setup with API support for integrating custom AI agents; designed to be extensible for various testing scenarios
limitations: Currently in alpha stage; primarily focused on Windows OS, which may limit cross-platform testing capabilities
